Name: Strength
Description: Strength represents the character’s physical power. It affect maximum damage the character can deal with physical attacks and item carry capacity.

Name: Dexterity
Description: Dexterity represents the accurateness of the character. It affect minimum damage of the character's physical attacks, critical chance, and spell cast speed.

Name: Agility
Description: Agility represents the overall speed of the character. It affects all animations' speed and dodge chance.

Name: Constitution
Description: Constitution represents the endurance and toughness of the character. It affects the character's maximum health, block power, and impact resistance.

Name: Intelligence
Description: Intelligence represents the character's capacity to learn and understand more complex concepts. It affects the maximum damage of magical spells, spell cast speed, and resource regeneration rate.

Name: Wisdom
Description: Wisdom represents the character's ability to apply their learned knowledge and ability to make wise decisions. It affects the minimum damage of magical spells and every other character's status.

Name: Charisma
Description: Charisma represents the character's ability to attract, influence, and lead others. It affects vendor pricing, unlocks quests, and improves followers' abilities.

Name: Ground Movement
Description: Let the hero move around the battle and perform feats of acrobatics.

Name: Ground Movement
Description: A basic training in movement skill allow the hero to perform Slide attack while running on the ground with high knockdown capability

Name: Ground Movement
Description: Further training in movement technique allow the hero to perform Tackle attack while running on the ground with high knockback capability.

Name: Ground Movement
Description: With utmost intensive training, equipments’ weight no longer affect the hero’s ability to move around.

Name: Ground Movement
Description: A perfect skill in ground movement allow the hero to completely dodge incoming attack while running.

Name: Air Movement
Description: Let the hero contest and dominate the aerial zone.

Name: Air Movement
Description: Training in air movement allow the hero to jump again midair.

Name: Air Movement
Description: The hero is trained to counter the weakness of being on the air, they are much more resistant to be knockdown.

Name: Air Movement
Description: With a bit of help from magic and training, the hero can now hover in the air to reduce falling speed while also able to move around.

Name: Tinkerer
Description: Let the hero be proficient in item usage.

Name: Arm Mastery
Description: Let the hero be proficient in pick-up weapons.

Name: Arm Mastery
Description: Adapted to use any weapon found in battle, the hero can unleash a combo of attacks with pick-up weapons.

Name: Wealth
Description: Let the hero get rich quicker and use coins in other ways.

Name: Immunity
Description: Let the hero be more resilient in battle.

Name: Resourceful
Description: Let the hero gains more resources in various ways.

Name: Resourceful
Description: With enough practice, the hero can now passively multi-task between other activities and increase their resource at once.

Name: Resourceful
Description: With bloodlust, the hero now gains some resources every time they hit the enemy. An essential skill for those who want to keep unleashing skills with great speed.

Name: Resourceful
Description: With patience, the hero now gains some resources every time they block an attack from the enemy. A perfect upgrade for those who prefer defensive combat and devastating counterattack.

Name: Combat Contest
Description: Let the hero be more skilled in combat, both offensive and defensive.

Name: Combat Contest
Description: A good defensive stance is important in surviving a combat. Thorough training lets the hero guard against incoming blows more effectively.

Name: Combat Contest
Description: Being mobile while guarding may look easy from an outsider's perspective, but it require a great deal of focus and rhythm balance. The hero is now capable of moving around while guarding.

Name: Double Piercing
Description: Unleash a set of quick stabbing. Cost no resources and has a short cooldown.

Name: Double Piercing
Description: A set of quick double stabs with a higher minor chance of a critical hit. A feat performed only by skilled swordsmen.

Name: Triple Piercing
Description: Swift triple stabs with a higher moderate chance of a critical hit. The speed becomes much more difficult to see by untrained eyes.

Name: Quadruple Piercing
Description: Quadruple stabs of unmatched speed with a higher moderate chance of a critical hit. Only those of inhuman eyes can see through this movement.

Name: Speed Piercing
Description: Surpassing the speed of master swordsmen, uncountable stabs within a few seconds with a higher chance of a critical hit. The hero also seems to become faster afterwards for a short time.

Name: Unseen Piercing
Description: Into the realm of invisibility, it is impossible to illustrate each stab of this relentless attacks. The hero becomes seemingly immune to all damage during this move.

Name: Counter Attack
Description: Attempt to parry incoming enemy attack and perform counterattack(s). Cost no resources and has no cooldown.

Name: Counter Attack
Description: A skilful parry and counterattack against incompetent attack from enemies by comparison. Quite a risky move with a high reward.
A brutal counterattack against those foolish enough to attack. The close distance also lets the hero draw a significant amount of blood from the victims. Almost vampiric in nature.

Name: Vital Slash
Description: A well-placed slash to a vital body part is enough to draw a pool of blood on the ground. Inflict bleeding and have a higher moderate critical hit chance.

Name: Second Wind
Description: Relief of exhaustion and pain, even temporarily, can shift the tide of battle. Recover some health with a moderate resource cost and cooldown.

Name: Steady Recovery
Description: Bolster regenerative ability to last in combat much longer. In addition to one-time healing, increase minor health regeneration for 10 seconds.

Name: Barrage
Description: Let loose a swift barrage of arrows. Use the same number of arrows shot but have no cooldown.

Name: Barrage
Description: Quickly nock, draw and loose three arrows in quick succession. Achievable only with great training.

Name: Charged Shot
Description: Draw and let loose a powerful arrow capable of penetrating enemies with ease. Use 1 arrow per shot with a small cooldown.

Name: Arrow Shower
Description: Aim to the sky and unleash a huge number of arrows. The arrows will shortly after rain down on the nearest enemy. Cost a huge number of arrows but has no cooldown.

Name: Precision Slash
Description: Slice the enemy with precision. This attack can not be dodged by normal means. Cost no resource and have a low cooldown.

Name: Retreating Shot
Description: Jump back and shoot at the enemy in the front. Great for dealing damage while dodging enemy attacks at once. Cost 1 arrow but has a moderate cooldown.

Name: Rapid Draw
Description: Enter into a focused state, allowing quick movement to attack with ferocity. Cost no resource but has high cooldown.

Name: Heat Burst
Description: Smiting the outer heat stone to burst out the inner flame of nearby allies. Greatly increase speed and poison resistance at the cost of defence and suffer minor damage over time. Cost some resources but has no cooldown.

Name: Heat Inner
Description: Smiting the inner heat stone to balance the inner flame of nearby allies. Increase attack power and water resistance at later levels with the cost of magic resistance reduction.

Name: Heat Burst Inner
Description: Smiting both inner and outer heat stones. This action destabilises the air temperature and causes a heat wave to expel outwards. Damage nearby enemies with fire elements and significant knockback impact. Cost a high amount of resources but has no cooldown.

Name: Chill Burst
Description: Smiting the outer cold stone to bolster the cold air into a protective aura for all nearby allies. Increase defence and fire resistance at the cost of fire resistance. Cost high resources but has no high cooldown.

Name: Chill Inner
Description: Smiting the inner cold stone to infuse the body with regenerative cooling for all nearby allies. Increase health regeneration and fire resistance. At later levels also increases resource regeneration and magic resistance. Cost no resources but has a high cooldown.

Name: Chill Burst Inner
Description: Smiting both inner and outer cold stones. This action destabilises the air temperature and causes a cold wave to expel outwards. Damage nearby enemies with water elements and moderate knockdown impact. Cost a high amount of resources but has no cooldown.
